subject: Continued Support
body:
Agent Turk,

With our sales representatives no longer contracted to work in-person at the Asheville office, I want to assure you that I will continue to provide whatever support you need remotely. It is very important to us that IRIS is a success.

When we win, you win.

Jack Moore

Senior Product Owner

Neuralink, Inc.

subject: Re: Continued Support
body:
Jack,

I promise I am just as worried about IRIS succeeding as you are. Save me the synergy crap.

subject: Pick Up
body:
Agent Turk,

We have a bit of a situation...call me ASAP.

Jack Moore

Senior Product Owner

Neuralink, Inc.

subject: Re: Pick Up
body:
Jack,

This is too big to fix. I'm not wiping your ass when you shit yourself.

subject: Neuralink Demonstration
body:
Agent Turk,

I think this is a great time to demonstrate the surveillance force multiplier IRIS will provide the FBI. Your agents aren't the only ones with implants. Enjoy the home movie!

When we win, you win.

Jack Moore

Senior Product Owner

Neuralink, Inc.

subject: Re: Neuralink Demonstration
body:
Jack,

Sorry for doubting you. I'll make sure things stay quiet.

Wyatt
